summary: The Ramones were an American punk rock band from Queens, New York, formed in 1974. They are considered the first true punk rock band and are very influential in punk culture, even though they weren't very commercially successful. The band members used fake last names, "Ramone," inspired by Paul McCartney. They played over 2,000 concerts and released 14 albums before breaking up in 1996. All original members have passed away. The Ramones are ranked among the greatest artists in music history and were inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 2002.
title: Ramones
